body:
recent versions of quantum espresso support linking with libxc.  spack's qe package currently doesn't appear to support it. 

note : linking with libxc@5: requires patching the source atm, see 2.5.1.1 https://www.quantum-espresso.org/Doc/user_guide/node12.html

/
title: add support for libxc in quantum espresso package
